app.title: LightCut -AI Auto Video Editor
app.description:
LightCut is a free AI video editor with rich video templates and video effects that helps you make stylish videos and vlogs easily. With AI video editing, you can make awesome videos with just one tap. Inspire Cam empowers you to shoot stunning videos as a PRO. You can also trim, merge your video clips with adding Text, Music, Stickers, Effects, Transitions and everything you need to make an creative video. Simple, but powerful, LightCut is an all-in-one video editor app for both beginners and professional users. 

Superfast Video editor with AI Powered 
- Auto video creator to edit your videos and photos in seconds. 
- You just select the videos clips and photos, after analyzing them in few seconds, the AI-powered One-Tap Edit feature will turn them into a high-quality video stories. 

Trendy and Rich Video Templates
-Easy-to-use Templates: All you need to do is just choosing the template and tempo you like, then a trendy video will be made automatically. 
-Multiple creative video template styles available: travel, road trip, nature, building & cIty, fashion, lifestyle vlog, sports and aerials etc. Stylish videos are available on this app in a minute. 

Inspire Cam Shooting Modes Makes You like a Pro
- Unsure about how to film or edit? Try it. Various creative shooting templates help you capturing fascinating footage. Step-by-step guide show you how to shoot, you just need to follow the tips.
- After shooting, a nice video will be made with simple steps. One-stop videp shooting and editing feature makes your videos eye-catching.

All-in-one Video Editor with Professional 
- Professional editing tools with all features help you make extraordinary videos. 
- All features like video trimmer, video cutter, slow/fast motion with adjustment make your video more attractive. Split video into multi clips
- Multiple stickers, font styles help you create awesome video anytime. 
- Edit/combine videos with various filters, effects and transitions
- Free Video Editor and NO ads & watermark
-Hundreds of free music all fully licensed

app.summary: Pro video editor & vlog maker, video templates: edit videos in minutes

reviews.text: This is a great app for beginner to some professional experience levels. This app does offer alot for being a free app. No ads or other purchases are needed. There are are plenty of amazing templates to choose from. To even sweeten the experience, it integrates really well if you have newer DJI products. The AI is spot on for creating videos with minimal input. The app does have its short comings, but not many. I honestly can't recommend this app enough!!!

Wish it had an option to have longer AI Edited videos, like 1-5mins or even longer. Otherwise, every template is very similar, and even selecting key moments in videos does very less. No lower paced templates either. Otherwise, overall, it's pretty cool and innovative, but the templates are all very MTV style quick cuts, only a proof of concept AI editor for me.

"LightCut is a game-changer in the world of mobile video editing! As a content creator, I've tried numerous editing apps, but none have impressed me as much as LightCut. From its intuitive interface to its powerful features, this app has exceeded all my expectations. One of the standout features of LightCut is its user-friendly interface, which makes editing videos a breeze even for beginners like me. The layout is clean a

I am just in love with this app more and more. It is that perfect app I found after all efforts of months and months finally I have something to rely upon for my videos to export properly and without any glitches and auto jump cut, just a star down as I need more transition effects, text effects and animations to use in my reels. Also, if PIP option can be added too. It is all good to go then.

A decent mobile editing app without tons of ads and severely limited features? Sign me up. lightCut seems to really be what you want for mobile editing. If you need a lot more power and more diverse tools you'll need a larger more powerful computer. For social media video this is absolutely perfect. Simple and easy to use, it doesn't seem buggy so far on my Pixel 6. I'll update this review if anything changes, but I am impressed so far!

Good: Very easy to make cuts and delete what you don't like Bad: Slow export (compared to CapCut for instance which is quite fast). BadI saved a 6:35 draft that I could export before , opened it again, app told me it's now over an hour long (while the actual timeline time increments show the correct length) and that I don't have sufficient storage (I have several GB of space on both internal and external storage. Looks solid otherwise :)

Update: Does not work for Android 14 on Pixel 6. Finally an editor that does it all without ads! I have uninstalled all the other apps due to ads or just out-right expensive. Developer should have a donate button because they deserve something for this wonderful app. Features are great as well, light speed ramping! My only gripe would be not being able to color grade each clip instead of the whole movie. I hope they can add that soon!

This an excellent video editor for making stylish videos quickly and the AI is amazing but, it is nearly impossible to use as when choosing my videos to use in my story there is no sort feature. All my videos seem randomly mixed therefore I am forced to scroll through all my videos to find the ones I want to use. Please add a sort feature to the library! Date taken decending would be a good start. With a sort feature i would give the app 5 stars. Thanks.

Decent editing app. It comes with the adjustment options you would expect. (Exposure, saturation, contrast, speed, add text..etc) There are several free templates available to use in-app. While they are pretty basic, the AI option does a decent job of finding dynamic movement from selected clips, so i can see how this app could be useful for someone who makes a lot of reels, or montages. Haven't found any key frame options yet, but we'll see.

Love it so far!! I've been trying paid apps on a laptop, all have been completely OVERPRICED, and are buggy and user(unfriendly)! This app is actually pretty dayum AWESOME, especially considering I can just set here on my phone and create my masterpiece, cinematic timelapse, from dinosaurs to earth 2. The music and sound effects options are pretty good too. ➕️➕️ 👍🏻👍🏻

app.AIReview:
LightCut -AI Auto Video Editor Review

Overview

LightCut – AI Auto Video Editor has swiftly become a prominent player in the crowded mobile video editing landscape, boasting over 2.8 million installs and an impressive average rating of 4.7 stars. Positioned as a free, user-friendly solution for creating stylish videos and vlogs, LightCut leverages artificial intelligence to streamline the editing process, targeting both beginners and more experienced creators. The app’s core promise – “edit videos in minutes” with AI assistance – is certainly attractive, and the extensive feature set suggests a robust tool capable of handling diverse video projects. It sits squarely within the Video Players & Editors category, competing directly with established names like InShot and CapCut, while aiming for an accessibility that distinguishes it.

Key Features

LightCut’s functionality is built around several key areas designed to simplify video creation:

  • AI Auto Editing: This is undoubtedly the headline feature. LightCut claims users can create professional-looking videos with a single tap by utilizing its AI algorithms to analyze footage and automatically suggest edits – including trimming, transitions, music selection, and visual effects. The extent of this automation remains a key factor in user satisfaction.
  • Rich Video Templates: The app provides a library of pre-designed video templates categorized by themes (e.g., travel, birthday, vlog). These templates offer a starting point for users who want to quickly produce polished videos without extensive editing knowledge. Template variety and quality are crucial here.
  • Video Effects & Transitions: Beyond the AI features, LightCut offers a broad selection of visual effects and transitions – including glitch effects, slow-motion, time-lapse, and classic fades and wipes – providing creative control for users who want to customize their videos.
  • Text & Music Integration: Users can add text overlays with various fonts and styles, as well as import music from their device or choose from a royalty-free music library integrated within the app.
  • Stickers & GIFs: A collection of stickers and GIFs adds another layer of personalization to videos, allowing users to inject humor and visual interest.
  • Clip Trimming & Merging: Fundamental video editing capabilities are present with precise clip trimming tools and seamless merging functionality.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use (AI Focus): LightCut's greatest strength is its intuitive interface and the powerful AI-driven auto-editing feature. The ‘one-tap’ approach genuinely lowers the barrier to entry for users new to video editing, allowing them to create decent videos quickly. The algorithm appears reasonably effective at suggesting appropriate edits, particularly for simple vlog-style content.
  • Abundant Features: The sheer volume of features – templates, effects, transitions, text tools – provides significant creative options. It’s a genuinely comprehensive editor within the free category.
  • Large User Base & Positive Reviews: With 2.84 million installs and an average rating of 4.7 stars, LightCut has clearly resonated with a large audience. The high ratings suggest users find the app useful and enjoyable to use.
  • Regular Updates: The developers have demonstrated commitment through frequent updates addressing bugs and adding new features – indicating ongoing development and support.

Areas for Improvement

  • AI Accuracy & Customization: While the AI auto-editing is a strong selling point, it’s not flawless. Users frequently report that the suggested edits aren't always ideal and require manual adjustments. Greater control over the AI parameters would significantly improve its effectiveness. A ‘refine’ option to adjust suggestions post-generation would be invaluable.
  • Template Quality Variation: While there are many templates, the quality varies considerably. Some are exceptionally well-designed, while others feel generic and dated. More curated and high-quality template offerings would elevate the user experience.
  • Music Library Limitations: The royalty-free music library, while appreciated, could benefit from a wider selection of genres and higher-quality tracks. Limited options can hinder creative expression.
  • Performance on Older Devices: Given the app’s complexity, performance on older or lower-end devices can be sluggish. Optimization for smoother operation would improve accessibility.

User Experience

The user interface is clean and modern, utilizing a bottom navigation bar for easy access to key features: Templates, Effects, Music, Text, and Export. The AI auto-editing flow is intuitive – users simply select a video, tap the “Auto Edit” button, and the app processes the footage. However, navigating through the extensive feature set can sometimes feel overwhelming, particularly for new users. The tutorial, while present, could be more comprehensive and interactive. The drag-and-drop functionality for arranging clips is generally smooth but occasionally suffers from minor lag.

Value for Money

LightCut’s biggest advantage is its free status. It offers a remarkably feature-rich experience without any subscription fees or in-app purchases (beyond optional premium effects packs). This makes it an exceptionally attractive option for users experimenting with video editing or creating short-form content. The app's value proposition is undeniably strong, providing significant functionality at no cost to the user.

Conclusion

LightCut – AI Auto Video Editor represents a compelling offering in the mobile video editing space. Its AI-powered auto-editing feature and extensive featureset make it an excellent choice for beginners seeking a simple yet powerful tool. While the AI’s accuracy needs refinement, and template quality could be improved, LightCut's free price point and large user base demonstrate its popularity and potential. It's a solid contender in a competitive market, providing genuine value to users who prioritize ease of use and creative possibilities without breaking the bank. It earns a strong recommendation for casual video creators and vloggers looking to streamline their workflow.
